bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Mary Lee Chapman was born 13 September 1862 in York, Pennsylvania. She married Harvey Lincoln Elkins (1862-1935), a broker of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, on 27 March 1889 and they had three children. Mary Lee Chapman Elkins conducted extensive genealogical research into her family's history. She died 3 August 1916 in Philadelphia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Papers, 1783-1966, of Mary Lee Chapman Elkins (1862-1916) containing her correspondence and genealogical research files, as well as the bills of sale, correspondence, deeds, diary, and other papers of her ancestor James Riddick Wilson (1793-1852) of Smithfield, Virginia. Papers also include materials on and records of Norfolk and Norfolk County, Virginia. Also includes papers of Ethel C. E. Lau (1895-1968), who transcribed and arranged most of the papers.Mary Lee Chapman Elkins. Papers, 1783-1966. Accession 27856.
